ccre.ctrl

Class AbstractJoystickWithPOV

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.ctrl.AbstractJoystickWithPOV
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJoystick, IJoystickWithPOV

    public abstract class AbstractJoystickWithPOV
extends java.lang.Object
implements IJoystickWithPOV
    An abstract class for easy implementation of IJoystickWithPOV based only on a set of polling implementations and a check event.
    Author:
    skeggsc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractJoystickWithPOV(EventInput check)
      Create a new Joystick that updates on the specified event.

      • isPOVPressedSource

        public BooleanInput isPOVPressedSource(int id)
        Description copied from interface: IJoystickWithPOV

      • getPOVAngleSource

        public FloatInput getPOVAngleSource(int id)
        Description copied from interface: IJoystickWithPOV
        Get a source representing the angle of the POV hat, if it is pressed. The angle is in degrees from 0 to 360, with zero at the top and increasing clockwise, at least on our tested models. If not pressed (as determined by isPOVPressedSource), the value is undefined. It can be, but is not necessarily, outside the range of 0-360.
        Specified by:
        getPOVAngleSource in interface IJoystickWithPOV
        Parameters:
        id - the POV hat id.
        Returns:
        the source representing the POV's angle.
